titleStmt.title: The instrumentality of faith asserted, prov'd, explain'd, compar'd with, and preferr'd to a conditional relation thereof in order to pardon and happiness when strictly taken in a legal or fœderal sense : deliver'd in several sermons / by W. Cross.
titleStmt.author: Cross, Walter, M.A.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
